verses.verse: כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֞ה <S%H2088><s%> this נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> For all this I considered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> in my heart וְלָב֣וּר <S%H952><s%> even to declare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> it הַצַּדִּיקִ֧ים <S%H6662><s%> all this that the righteous וְהַחֲכָמִ֛ים <S%H2450><s%> and the wise וַעֲבָדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5652><s%> and their works בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> [are] in the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> either אַהֲבָ֣ה <S%H160><s%> love גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> or שִׂנְאָ֗ה <S%H8135><s%> or hatred אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> does not יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> no man הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> anything לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> [by] all [that is] before

הַכֹּ֞ל <S%H3605><s%> for all כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and to him that לַכֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> for all מִקְרֶ֨ה <S%H4745><s%> event אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> All [things come] alike to all [there is] one לַצַּדִּ֤יק <S%H6662><s%> to the righteous וְלָרָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> and to the wicked לַטּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> to the good וְלַטָּה֣וֹר <S%H2889><s%> and to the clean וְלַטָּמֵ֔א <S%H2931><s%> and to the unclean וְלַזֹּבֵ֔חַ <S%H2076><s%> to him that sacrificeth וְלַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else זֹבֵ֑חַ <S%H2076><s%> sacrificeth כַּטּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> not as [is] the good כַּֽחֹטֶ֔א <S%H2398><s%> so [is] the sinner הַנִּשְׁבָּ֕ע <S%H7650><s%> [and] he that sweareth כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who שְׁבוּעָ֥ה <S%H7621><s%> an oath יָרֵֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> is afraid

זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> This רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> This [is] an evil בְּכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is נַעֲשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> among all [things] that are done תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִקְרֶ֥ה <S%H4745><s%> event אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> that [there is] one לַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> for all וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> unto all yea also the heart בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הָ֠אָדָם <S%H120><s%> of men מָלֵא־ <S%H4390><s%> is full רָ֨ע <S%H7451><s%> of evil וְהוֹלֵל֤וֹת <S%H1947><s%> and madness בִּלְבָבָם֙ <S%H3824><s%> [is] in their heart בְּחַיֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H2416><s%> while they live וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> and after אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֵּתִֽים׃ <S%H4191><s%> that [they go] to the dead

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> surely מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> For אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after [יִבָּחֵר כ] (יְחֻבַּ֔ר <S%H977><s%> acceptable ק) אֶ֥ל <S%H413><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> to all the living יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> to him that is בִּטָּח֑וֹן <S%H986><s%> there is hope כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> surely לְכֶ֤לֶב <S%H3611><s%> dog חַי֙ <S%H2416><s%> for a living ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> is better מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> lion הַמֵּֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> than a dead

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> For הַֽחַיִּ֛ים <S%H2416><s%> For the living יוֹדְעִ֖ים <S%H3045><s%> know שֶׁיָּמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> that they shall die וְהַמֵּתִ֞ים <S%H4191><s%> but the dead אֵינָ֧ם <S%H369><s%> nor יוֹדְעִ֣ים <S%H3045><s%> know מְא֗וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> not any thing וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any לָהֶם֙ שָׂכָ֔ר <S%H7939><s%> neither have they any more a reward כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> of them is forgotten זִכְרָֽם׃ <S%H2143><s%> for the memory

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Indeed אַהֲבָתָ֧ם <S%H160><s%> Also their love גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed שִׂנְאָתָ֛ם <S%H8135><s%> and their hatred גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed קִנְאָתָ֖ם <S%H7068><s%> and their envy כְּבָ֣ר <S%H3528><s%> is now אָבָ֑דָה <S%H6><s%> perished וְחֵ֨לֶק <S%H2506><s%> neither have they any more a portion אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> will no לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> longer לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> in any [thing] that is done תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱכֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> eat בְּשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> with joy לַחְמֶ֔ךָ <S%H3899><s%> thy bread וּֽשֲׁתֵ֥ה <S%H8354><s%> and drink בְלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> with a merry יֵינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3196><s%> thy wine כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כְבָ֔ר <S%H3528><s%> now רָצָ֥ה <S%H7521><s%> accepteth הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> for God אֶֽת־ <S%H854><s%> for מַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ <S%H4639><s%> thy works

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֕ת <S%H6256><s%> be always יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> Let בְגָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H899><s%> Let thy garments לְבָנִ֑ים <S%H3836><s%> white וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> no ointment עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשְׁךָ֥ <S%H7218><s%> and let thy head אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֶחְסָֽר׃ <S%H2637><s%> lack

רְאֵ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> joyfully חַיִּ֜ים <S%H2416><s%> Live עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> with the wife אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אָהַ֗בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> whom thou lovest כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of the life הֶבְלֶ֔ךָ <S%H1892><s%> of thy vanity אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> which he hath given לְךָ֙ תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> thee under the sun כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days הֶבְלֶ֑ךָ <S%H1892><s%> of thy vanity כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> this חֶלְקְךָ֙ <S%H2506><s%> for that [is] thy portion בַּֽחַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> in [this] life וּבַעֲמָ֣לְךָ֔ <S%H5999><s%> and in thy labour אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you עָמֵ֖ל <S%H6001><s%> which thou takest תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun

כֹּ֠ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after תִּמְצָ֧א <S%H4672><s%> findeth יָֽדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> Whatsoever thy hand לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do בְּכֹחֲךָ֖ <S%H3581><s%> [it] with thy might עֲשֵׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> do כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> there מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> for [there is] no work וְחֶשְׁבּוֹן֙ <S%H2808><s%> nor device וְדַ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> nor knowledge וְחָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> nor wisdom בִּשְׁא֕וֹל <S%H7585><s%> in the grave אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> whither thou goest שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it ס

שַׁ֜בְתִּי <S%H7725><s%> I returned וְרָאֹ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> and saw תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> is not לַקַּלִּ֨ים <S%H7031><s%> [is] not to the swift הַמֵּר֜וֹץ <S%H4793><s%> that the race וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> is not לַגִּבּוֹרִ֣ים <S%H1368><s%> to the strong הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> nor the battle וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> again לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not לַחֲכָמִ֥ים <S%H2450><s%> to the wise לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> neither yet bread וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> again לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not לַנְּבֹנִים֙ <S%H995><s%> to men of understanding עֹ֔שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> nor yet riches וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> again לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לַיֹּדְעִ֖ים <S%H3045><s%> to men of skill חֵ֑ן <S%H2580><s%> nor yet favour כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> but time וָפֶ֖גַע <S%H6294><s%> and chance יִקְרֶ֥ה <S%H7136><s%> happeneth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for גַּם֩ <S%H1571><s%> again לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יֵדַ֨ע <S%H3045><s%> also knoweth הָאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> For man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִתּ֗וֹ <S%H6256><s%> not his time כַּדָּגִים֙ <S%H1709><s%> as the fishes שֶׁנֶּֽאֱחָזִים֙ <S%H270><s%> that are taken בִּמְצוֹדָ֣ה <S%H4686><s%> castle רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> in an evil וְכַ֨צִּפֳּרִ֔ים <S%H6833><s%> and as the birds הָאֲחֻז֖וֹת <S%H270><s%> that are caught בַּפָּ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> in the snare כָּהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> so יֽוּקָשִׁים֙ <S%H3369><s%> snared בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [are] the sons הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of men לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> time רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> in an evil כְּשֶׁתִּפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> when it falleth עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and פִּתְאֹֽם׃ <S%H6597><s%> suddenly

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also זֹ֛ה <S%H2090><s%> This רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> have I seen חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> also under the sun וּגְדוֹלָ֥ה <S%H1419><s%> and it [seemed] great הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city קְטַנָּ֔ה <S%H6996><s%> [There was] a little וַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> men בָּ֖הּ מְעָ֑ט <S%H4592><s%> and few וּבָֽא־ <S%H935><s%> within it and there came אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> about מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> a great וְסָבַ֣ב <S%H5437><s%> against it and besieged אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וּבָנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> it and built עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against מְצוֹדִ֥ים <S%H4685><s%> bulwarks גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> great

וּמָ֣צָא <S%H4672><s%> Now there was found בָ֗הּ אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מִסְכֵּן֙ <S%H4542><s%> in it a poor חָכָ֔ם <S%H2450><s%> wise וּמִלַּט־ <S%H4422><s%> delivered ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <S%H2451><s%> and he by his wisdom וְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> yet no man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no זָכַ֔ר <S%H2142><s%> remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הַמִּסְכֵּ֖ן <S%H4542><s%> that same poor הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> I

וְאָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Then said אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I טוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] better חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> I Wisdom מִגְּבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> than strength וְחָכְמַ֤ת <S%H2451><s%> wisdom הַמִּסְכֵּן֙ <S%H4542><s%> nevertheless the poor man's בְּזוּיָ֔ה <S%H959><s%> [is] despised וּדְבָרָ֖יו <S%H1697><s%> and his words אֵינָ֥ם <S%H369><s%> are not נִשְׁמָעִֽים׃ <S%H8085><s%> are not heard

דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> The words חֲכָמִ֔ים <S%H2450><s%> of wise בְּנַ֖חַת <S%H5183><s%> in quiet נִשְׁמָעִ֑ים <S%H8085><s%> [men are] heard מִזַּעֲקַ֥ת <S%H2201><s%> more than the cry מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> of him that ruleth בַּכְּסִילִֽים׃ <S%H3684><s%> among fools

טוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] better חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> Wisdom מִכְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> than weapons קְרָ֑ב <S%H7128><s%> of war וְחוֹטֶ֣א <S%H2398><s%> sinner אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> but one יְאַבֵּ֥ד <S%H6><s%> destroyeth טוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> good הַרְבֵּֽה׃ <S%H7235><s%> much
